remarks: If the intersection with a non-majorizing element is an atom, the intersecting element is not an atom.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jun-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
intnat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
intnat.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
intnat.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
intnat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
intnatN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( -. Y .<_ X /\ ( X ./\ Y ) e. A ) ) -> -. Y e. A ) $.
